title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor. It takes a long time (30 sec in my case) to update the checked state of the table. A busy cursor should be shown.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table while exporting a zip file, there is no indication that the process is ongoing. The checkboxes take a long time to update, resulting in a delay of approximately 30 seconds.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table while exporting a zip file, a busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the process is ongoing. The checkboxes should update in a timely manner without significant delay.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Start the export Zip process.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Click the 'OK' button.
